title: Strawberry Panzanella
directions: Cut Angel Food cake in 1" cubes
combine strawberries, cinnamon sugar and 1 tablespoon glaze until blended. Let stand 10 -15 minutes or until juices appear.
Place cake pieces on baking sheet and coat with spray. Bake 10 - 12 minutes or until toasted
Combine all ingredients, including 1 tablespoon glaze, toss gently to serves
ingredients: 1 15 oz Angel Food Cake, coursely chopped
2 tablespoons fresh mint leaves, finely chopped
